name: Deadly Apparition Starter Pack
description:
Gear up for your next mission with the Deadly Apparition Starter Pack. Equip the menacing Deadly Apparition Phantom Outfit and Star-stuff Primary Weapon Wrap to strike fear into your opponents every time they fall into your crosshairs. Includes 600 Rogue Bucks so you can round out your look in the in-game store with emotes, sprays, outfits, wraps, profile customization, and more.

This Pack Contains: - 600 Rogue Bucks - Deadly Apparition Phantom Outfit - Star-stuff Primary Weapon Wrap
